original_text: While Jezebel was killing off the Lord’s prophets, Obadiah had taken a hundred prophets and hidden them in two caves, fifty in each, and had supplied them with food and water.)
korean_text: 이세벨이 여호와의 선지자들을 멸할 때에 오바댜가 선지자 백 명을 가지고 오십 명씩 굴에 숨기고 떡과 물을 먹였더라

sentences.original_text: While Jezebel was killing off the Lord's prophets
Obadiah had taken a hundred prophets
and hidden them in two caves
and had supplied them with food and water
